    RecordSource ="SELECT SpecialWinners.RXN, SpecialWinners.ENTRY_DATE, SpecialWinners.Desc_FN, Sp"
        "ecialWinners.Desc_LN, SpecialWinners.SCH_CODE, SpecialWinners.NCAT, SpecialWinne"
        "rs.EXHB_TITLE, SpecialWinners.PID, Schools.SCHOOL, Persons.SALUTATION, Persons.F"
        "NAME, Persons.MI, Persons.LNAME, [Desc_FN] & [Desc_LN] AS DescSort, [LNAME] & [F"
        "NAME] AS PerSort FROM (SpecialWinners LEFT JOIN Schools ON SpecialWinners.SCH_CO"
        "DE=Schools.SCH_CODE) LEFT JOIN Persons ON SpecialWinners.PID=Persons.PID; "
    OnOpen ="[Event Procedure]"
    DatasheetFontName ="Arial"

                Begin Line
                    Left =60
                    Top =1140
                    Width =9300
                    Name ="Line14"
                    GUID = Begin
                        0x1132de7487498448bd4a3abe5ab73a3b
                    End
                    LeftPadding =30
                    TopPadding =30
                    RightPadding =30
                    BottomPadding =30
                    GridlineStyleLeft =0
                    GridlineStyleTop =0
                    GridlineStyleRight =0
                    GridlineStyleBottom =0
                    GridlineWidthLeft =1
                    GridlineWidthTop =1
                    GridlineWidthRight =1
                    GridlineWidthBottom =1
                End
            End
        End
        Begin PageFooter
            Height =0
            Name ="PageFooterSection"
            GUID = Begin
                0x41e34c00b467bb4dab66c6894d559bca
            End
        End
    End
End
CodeBehindForm
Attribute VB_GlobalNameSpace = False
Attribute VB_Creatable = True
Attribute VB_PredeclaredId = True
Attribute VB_Exposed = False

Option Compare Database

Private Sub Report_Open(Cancel As Integer)
  Dim promptmsg As String
  Dim Instrg As String
  On Error GoTo SubError ' <-- goes to bottome of the Sub and displays message
  ' <- tick mark means comment  Add these anywhere
  ' Fill in the first part of the report Title
  ' Build a string to put in the inputbox as a prompt to user
  '  Stings are in quotes unless you use a string variable or constant
  '  promptmsg is a string variable,
  '  Note to continue on next line here, use the underscore character '_'
  '  the vbCrLf means go to a new line when the message is displayed
  '  the '&' character adds the strings together. you could use a + sign also
  promptmsg = "Enter Sort Order  --- " & vbCrLf & _
     " R = Recipient Number [RXN] (default)" & vbCrLf & _
     " D = Description / StudentName [Description]  " & vbCrLf & _
     " P = Person / Teacher [Person] "
  Instrg = InputBox(promptmsg, "SpecialWinners Summary Report", "R")
  If Len(Instrg) <> 1 Then Instrg = "R"
  Me.OrderBy = "[RXN]"
  Me.rptSort.Caption = "Sorted By Recipient Number"
  If UCase(Mid(Instrg, 1, 1)) = "R" Then
      Me.OrderBy = "[RXN]"
      Me.rptSort.Caption = "Sorted By Recipient Number"
  End If
  If UCase(Mid(Instrg, 1, 1)) = "D" Then
      Me.OrderBy = "[DescSort]"
      Me.rptSort.Caption = "Sorted By Description / Student"
  End If
  If UCase(Mid(Instrg, 1, 1)) = "P" Then
      Me.OrderBy = "[PerSort]"
      Me.rptSort.Caption = "Sorted By Person / Teacher"
  End If
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox (Err.Description)
End Sub
